thread.title: Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Ashley puts a gloating Gloria on notice
thread.title_full: Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Ashley puts a gloating Gloria on notice

title: Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Ashley puts a gloating Gloria on notice
text:
Y&R Day Ahead Recap: Ashley puts a gloating Gloria on notice 
Candace Young Tuesday, February 7th, 2017 
Wednesday February 8, 2017: Hilary refuses to sign a document, Cane is livid at Victoria’s announcement, and Lauren and Jack give an interview. Pin 
Jack arrives at Jabot to find Gloria already in the office. She tells him he’s out of luck on avoiding her. Jack sends her back to her desk, where she stops Ravi from entering Jack's office. She notes he’s nerdy but easy on the eyes. Ashley arrives and learns Gloria is Jack’s new receptionist. She busts into his office and hollers, “Are you high?” Ashley demands to know what Gloria has on him. Jack won’t fire her. Ash exits and takes Ravi to his office, where she tells him about Gloria conning her father into marriage and almost destroying Jabot. She pleads with Ravi to steer clear of her. 
At Crimson Lights, Phyllis loves Lauren’s outfit for today’s interview on GC Buzz. Lauren hopes to keep Jack from dominating the airtime. Phyllis tips her off that Jack runs his hand through his hair when he’s angry, and touches his tie before he jumps in on a conversation. 
At the Club, Lily and Devon discuss Hilary tearing up his generous check. Lily figures she wants more money. Devon assures her he’s on top of the situation. Lily wonders if he’s really sure he wants this marriage to be over. After she’s gone, Devon flashes to Hilary giving him back the things he bought her and to her ripping up his check. 
More: Y&R alum Max Page celebrates hospital release 
In the Brash & Sassy lab, Cane and Billy debate about what they should do after they buy the company. Victoria arrives in a good mood and announces she wants to buy Brash & Sassy on her own. Cane thinks her sense of entitlement is arrogant considering all the hard work he’s put in. Billy doesn’t have a problem with it. Cane sneers that Billy would say anything to get Vikki back into bed. Billy thinks it’s fair, and it’s easier for one person to lead than to do everything by committee. Cane informs Victoria it’s not going to happen. Lily arrives. The arguing continues, and Cane reiterates his position. Vikki cancels her meeting with Lily and urges her to help Cane see that this is happening. After, Billy tells Vikki he’s happy for her and will have her back. Vikki asks if Cane was right – was he hoping to get back in her bed? Billy wonders if she’d be surprised if he said yes. He recalls that they had a lot of really great times. 
Michael arrives at GC Buzz to advise Hilary on her divorce. Hilary snaps that she doesn’t want Devon’s money. Michael wants her to sign a document saying she won’t take Devon to court in the future. Devon arrives and she tells him the paper is insulting. Hil wonders if he thinks she’s planning a sneak attack. Devon notes it wouldn’t be the first time she broke his heart. 
Lauren and Phyllis enter Jack’s office, ignoring Gloria’s attempt to stop them. Phyllis wonders about Gloria, and Lauren laughs her head off that he was forced to give her a job. They try to find out why he hired her as his receptionist, but Jack wants to focus on the upcoming interview. In Ravi’s office, Ashley is beyond impressed with his progress on Jabot Go. Phyllis enters, and Ravi excuses himself. Phyllis asks Ashley if they can put their differences aside and work together. They rehash Phyllis’ situation with Jack. Phyllis assures Ashley she’s on a new path that doesn’t include Jack Abbott. In the hall, Ravi knocks over Gloria’s new plant while trying to avoid her. 
Related: CBS soap actress cast in Jalen vs. Everybody pilot 
At Crimson Lights, Lily tries to talk to Cane about Brash & Sassy, but he maintains that Victoria’s vision isn’t going to happen. He plans to pitch Jill directly. Lily wonders if he could be happy working for Victoria. Cane doesn’t feel she’ll value him. He gets a call and learns even if he cashes everything out it’s not enough money. Lily is sorry. Cane vows he won’t rollover. 
Lauren and Jack arrive at GC Buzz. Michael kisses his wife before telling Devon that Hilary refused to sign the document. Devon says she’s up to something – if only he could figure out what. During the interview, Lauren does the talking, leaving Jack frustrated. 
At Jabot, Gloria watches the interview and chuckles to Ashley that Jack’s not holding his own. Ashley announces she’s taking a larger role in the company to protect her father’s legacy. She pushes Glo’s feet off the desk, tells her she doesn’t like her, and warns, “Don’t get too damn comfortable around here.” 
Paul asks Sharon what she’s looking for. She says, “Divorce papers.” 
Reed says into the phone, “I know it’s late there, but I need your help, Dad.” 
Billy leans in to kiss Victoria.
